auth.login_tip: Enter your email below to login to your account.

archive.title: Archive
archive.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this email?
archive.delete_confirmation_description: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the email and its attachments.

ingestions.title: Ingestion Sources
ingestions.name: Name
ingestions.edit_description: Make changes to your ingestion source here.
ingestions.create_description: Add a new ingestion source to start archiving emails.
ingestions.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this ingestion?
ingestions.delete_confirmation_description: This will delete all archived emails, attachments, indexing, and files associated with this ingestion. If you only want to stop syncing new emails, you can pause the ingestion instead.
ingestions.bulk_delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected ingestions?
ingestions.bulk_delete_confirmation_description: This will delete all archived emails, attachments, indexing, and files associated with these ingestions. If you only want to stop syncing new emails, you can pause the ingestions instead.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.name: Name
roles.edit_description: Make changes to the role here.
roles.create_description: Add a new role to the system.
roles.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
roles.delete_confirmation_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the role.

users.title: User Management
users.name: Name
users.edit_description: Make changes to the user here.
users.create_description: Add a new user to the system.
users.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.delete_confirmation_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user and remove their data from our servers.

email_preview.not_available: Raw .eml file not available for this email.

ingestion_source_form.service_account_key_placeholder: Paste your service account key JSON content
ingestion_source_form.client_secret_placeholder: Enter the secret Value, not the Secret ID
ingestion_source_form.org_wide_warning: Please note that this is an organization-wide operation. This kind of ingestions will import and index all email inboxes in your organization. If you want to import only specific email inboxes, use the IMAP connector.

setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Set up the initial administrator account for Open Archiver.
setup.create_admin_account: Create the first administrator account to get started.

api_keys_page.title: API Keys
api_keys_page.name: Name
api_keys_page.generate_modal_description: Please provide a name and expiration for your new API key.
api_keys_page.generated_message: Your API key is generated, please copy and save it in a secure place. This key will only be shown once.

dashboard_page.title: Dashboard
dashboard_page.no_ingestion_header: You don't have any ingestion source set up.
dashboard_page.no_ingestion_text: Add an ingestion source to start archiving your inboxes.
